CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Reason_for_Request__c,"SIP Team Admin Ticket")=TRUE, "3). Approved, Working", IF(ISBLANK(Approval_Submit_Date__c) ,"1). Created, Not Submitted", IF(ISBLANK(Approval_Approved_Date__c) , "2). Submitted, Not Approved", IF(ISBLANK(Closed_Date__c), "3). Approved, Working", "4). Closed"))))
CustomField.label: Ticket Pipeline
